snippet: The administration seeks the reversal of a ruling that blocked the president’s plan to let more than four million undocumented immigrants legally live and work in the United States.
abstract: Pres Obama asks Supreme Court to overturn appeals court ruling blocking his 2014 executive action allowing undocumented immigrants who are parents of citizens or lawful permanent residents to apply for program; intent of plan is to spare such immigrants from deportation and allow them to work.

byline.contributor: Julia Preston contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The administration seeks the reversal of a ruling that blocked the president’s plan to let more than four million undocumented immigrants legally live and work in the United States.

headline.main: Obama Administration Asks Supreme Court to Save Immigration Plan
headline.print_headline: Justices Asked to Save Plan to Overhaul Immigration
